body_html:
I've not been able to get the tensorflow build to carry my DYLD_LIBRARY_FLAGS down inside the templated cross_tool_not_gcc_yadda command so that I can build against CUDA to double check this.

If someone else can confirm that Xcode 7.3.1 with the latest CUDA works or can clue me in on how to fix the DYLD_LIBRARY_FLAGS problem, that'd be cool
